description.p: Size. Basking Sharkin can grow to be between 10 to 13 feet tall and weigh up too 1.9 to 2.6 t. Your size is Large.
Tough Hide. You gain a +1 bonus to your AC, and you have resistance to non-magical piercing damage.
Huge Liver. You have resistance to poison damage, as well as advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

Vicious Bite.When you take the Attack action on your turn, you can replace one of your attacks with a vicious bite attack. This is a natural weapon attack with which you are proficient with and uses your Strength modifier for its attack rolls. This bite does 1d8 bludgeoning damage, but grows to 2d8 at 5th level, 3d8 at 10th level, and 4d8 at 20th level.
